# name

**Instance Property**

The name of the resource in the bundle.

## Declaration

```swift
let name: String
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLResource/name] property specifies both the resource name and its file extension.

## Accessing resource properties

- **bundle**: The bundle containing the resource.
- **subdirectory**: The subdirectory, if any, of the resource.
- **locale**: The bundle containing the resource.

items.description: The subdirectory, if any, of the resource.
items.name: subdirectory
